pr_title: Move the currentPath & path methods to the parent class for removing the duplicated codes

timeline.message: Move the currentPath & path methods to the parent class for removing the duplicated codes

timeline.bodyText: This implementation is too tied to how the Deque is used. I would expect iterating over the object passed in to create the right name, but this assumes it needs to use descendingIterator(). How about updating these methods to accept Iterator<String> instead so that they aren't tightly coupled to the original use?
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: It's not appropriate  to put the two methods in ParquetUtil.java, I've moved them out of the utility class.  Thanks.
replies.author: openinx

timeline.message: Move the currentPath&path out of ParquetUtil.java
